resources.string:
"

lWS QR

This programm designed as QR Code plugin for lightweight Web Server (lWS). It can be used standalone as small and simple QR code generator also. Start to enter text in the text area below or paste it from clipboard and press 'Encode' button to see QR code. To see this text again press 'Clear' button. lWS QR can be easyly integrated with your application. Source code and aditional information available here"
